items.sentence: Prophets have been forecasting the end of the world for centuries.
I don\'t want you to think that I\'m not happy with your decision.
Tom says he\'s thinking about not doing what Mary asked him to do.
As soon as we saw what Tom was wearing, we all burst out laughing.
Tom\'s stressful job is having a detrimental effect on his health.
We have some guys on our team who don\'t understand French at all.
I\'ll be spending most of my time in Boston the next three months.
The police found drugs on the bus and detained all the passengers.
They agree that they have no choice but to give up the whole plan.
Tom almost died after eating the mushrooms that Mary had gathered.
Tom and I went to the same high school. He was a year ahead of me.
I\'m satisfied with everything and don\'t want to change anything.
I couldn\'t live with myself if I didn\'t do something about that.
When I asked him to lend me some money, he turned down my request.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me Mary didn\'t need to do that.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me Mary didn\'t want to do that.
I wish that I hadn\'t told Tom that I\'d go to Australia with him.
I\'m sure we\'d be able to get this done by 2:30 if Tom helped us.
Anyway, if it just stops raining, then we might be able to go out.
Tom works from early in the morning until late at night every day.
